paymentPlanId.description: Finance techologies API internal id for payment plan

monthlyPrice.description: Monthly price for accessory per payment plan

email.description: Email to send the notification to

productId.description: Id of the product to add.

operatorId.description: Id of the operator which subscription we are adding

subscriptionId.description: Id of the subscription which we are adding

receiptInformation.description: Customer information that pays the bill.

existingPhoneNumber.description: Existing phone number that customer wants to transfer.

existingSimCardNumber.description: Existing sim card number that customer wants to transfer.

AddPhoneSubscriptionRequest.description: Model to add phone subscription addonline to basket with contact information.

requiredFreightIds.description: Freight Ids required by this Service. Null or empty means the Service does not require any specific Freight.

addonType.description: The flag determines the type if service.

isAppleCare.description: Indicates if this is Apple Care addon

dictionaryKeyPart.description: Tell frontend if some special translations should be used for the addon

productReview.description: To show addon reviews on page

annuityFactor.description:
Factor which the original price has to be multiplied with to get the monthly payment amount.

Includes interest if there is interest in the payment plan.

durationMonths.description: Amount of months in the payment plan.

priceLimit.description:
Price limit for products to select a good payment plan.

e.g. for items below 499e we want to use 3-12month plans and for items over 499e we want to use 24-72 month plans.

appleCareOrderId.description: Combined with SalesOrderId to identify the row

salesOrderId.description: Sales order this apple care order belongs to

salesOrderLineId.description: Sales order line id this apple care order belongs to

deviceId.description: Device id the apple care service is linked to

salesDate.description: Date when apple care was sold

expirationDate.description: Date when apple care service expires

cancellationDate.description: Date when aplle care subscription was cancelled

hasFailed.description:
Indicator whether apple care order creation has failed and needs additional work
(IMEI incorrect most likely why failed)

displayedOrderId.description: Id that is displayed to frontend

appleCareOrderId.description: Combined with OrderId to identify the row

orderId.description: Order id of the apple care order

orderLineId.description: order line id/line ref of the apple care order

deviceId.description: Device id to be saved for the apple care order

appleCareOrderId.description: Combined with SalesOrderId to identify the row

productTitle.description: Name of the product apple care covers

orderId.description: Order id this apple care belongs to

orderLineId.description: Order line id this apple care belongs to

deviceId.description: Device id where apple care is bound to

salesDate.description: Date when apple care order was sold

expirationDate.description: Date when apple care order expires

cancellationDate.description: Date when apple care order was cancelled

hasFailed.description: Indicator whether apple care order creation has failed

status.description: Status of the apple care order

agreementNumber.description: Agreement number given by Apple when order is created

displayedOrderId.description: Order id that is displayed to frontend

orderPageUrl.description: Orderpage URL is given when Expert.WebApi.Controllers.Payments.EcsterController.ApplicationStatusResponseApiModel.Status is Expert.WebApi.Controllers.Payments.EcsterController.SubmitApplicationResponseStatusEnum.OK

paymentCancelUrl.description: Cancel URL is provided when Expert.WebApi.Controllers.Payments.EcsterController.ApplicationStatusResponseApiModel.Status is not Expert.WebApi.Controllers.Payments.EcsterController.SubmitApplicationResponseStatusEnum.OK

cancellationToken.description: Base64 encoded token for the cancellation.

comment.description: Additional details provided by the customer.

remoteMeeting.description: Does customer want a remote meeting.

storeId.description: Id of the Store this Slot is for.

storeSalesPersonName.description: Name of the SalesPerson responsible for this Slot. If no Sales Person has been specified, this field will be null.

storeSalesPersonId.description: Id of the SalesPerson responsible for this Slot. If no Sales Person has been specified, this field will be null.

salesPersonnel.description: List of available sales persons for the store.

appointmentBookingContactEmail.description: Email for contacting store regarding appointment booking

B2bSetContactInfoRequestWebApiModel.description: Set b2b basket contact info request

giftCard.description: Describes an applied Gift Card for the frontend.

requiredFreightIds.description: Required Freights for the basket from the selected services.

useMyPowerBalance.description: Bool if MyPower balance should be used

myPowerBalance.description: How much balance customer has available

paymentStepDisclaimerTexts.description: Disclaimer text explaining why some payment mehods are not active

basketDisclaimers.description:
Discaimers are shown in the basket before Pay button.
Distict list of disclaimers.

b2BRedirectUrl.description: Redirect url for b2c to b2b basket

comingBalance.description: How much balance the basket would yield

requireAcceptance.description: If attachment has to be accepted by customer

BasketBundleApiModel.description: ApiModel to display basket bundle line

percentageAmount.description: Discount percentage amount for percentage based discounts.

discountType.description: Identifies the Type of the Discount. Matches !:Interfaces.Enums.DiscountType.

isSystemAdded.description: Discount was added by system and should not be modified by user

BasketGiftCardApiModel.description: Describes an applied Gift Card for the frontend.

totalMyPowerBalance.description: How much balance customer has available

basketAvailableMyPowerBalance.description: How much balance customer can use for this basket

isVoucher.description: Boolean indicating whether this Value Code is a legacy Voucher.

monetaryAmount.description: Monetary value calculated from the points. Possibly null if we are missing appsetting for the calculation.

sortOrder.description: Order of option, lower should be first

pointOperatorType.description: How this affects points of the Buyback

pointAmount.description: Amount of points (or multiplier in case of PointOperatorType = multiply)

ignoreNextQuestion.description: If the next question should be skipped

goToEnd.description: If all next questions should be skipped

sortOrder.description: Order of option, lower should be first

autoScrap.description: If case should be automatically scrapped

sortValue.description: Sorting value for the Category. Lower values come first.

secondarySortValue.description: Secondary sorting value (for category page subcategory list).

CategoryApiModel.description:
Common Category API Model. With #13781 this API Model should be the only Category API model returned to the frontend.
            
Most properties for this Model should be nullable: different APIs may return different portions of the Category.

validator.description: Is used to validate the request. This is the same as the eClub parameter from Voyado.

customerLoginToken.description:
Is used to validate the request.
This our own login token implementation used with SMSs.

subscribe.description: Describes whether to subscribe the email for newsletters.

pointsToBalanceTimestamp.description: Timestamp when points are added to customer balance

deltaTotalBalanceInMoney.description: How much point balance changed in money

pointLogs.description: List of all Club pointlogs related to the order.

balanceUsed.description: Discount received by using club points on order

pointReason.description: Log comment, the reason why points were added.

clubPointLogId.description: Unique id for the log event

productIdToSpecificationAttributes.description: Dictionary of product specification attributes with product Id as the key

compatibleProductIds.description: (Internal) Product Ids related to this Product.

manufacturerId.description:
Link to the internal Manufacturer.
Null if the internal Manufacturer table does not contain a Manufacturer matching the name.

productIdentifier.description:
Identifier for the source Product.
E-0 for external products, I-0 for Internal.

serviceCategoryIds.description: Service Category Ids to filter results with.

total.description: Total amount of results for the Query.

pageSize.description: Page Size based on which the Page property was calculated.

contactInfo.description: Model used when editing customer information.

elguideAccept.description: Set customer's elguide accept to true.

buybackCategoryId.description: Child category where this case should be created

storeId.description: Store where customer should return the product

returnStoreId.description: ID of the Store where the goods will be returned to.

CreateOrderReturnInputApiModel.description: Model for creating a new return.

otherReason.description: Customer description of the return reason

productPackageOpened.description: If customer has opened the product package.

productUsed.description: If customer has used the product.

message.description: Custom payment error message if exists for given ID

isPrimary.description: Determines if the address is primary for the customer.

newsletterSubscription.description: Boolean to determine if customer has agreed to newsletter

smsSubscription.description: Boolean to determine if customer has agreed to sms marketing messages

clubSubscription.description: Boolean to determine if customer is club member.

myPowerIdQr.description: Base64 string that contains encoded MyPower ID QRCode in SVG format Can be used directly inside tag after decoding

input.description: Input can be a phone number or email address

reVerifyToken.description: Token from the CustomerInformationRequest that needs to be verified again on submission.

CustomerInformationRequestApiModel.description: ApiModel for the GDPR customer information request

DueDateEnum.description:
Day in month when payment is due.
Only applicable and mandatory if payment option has properties new or raise set to true.
Valid values: 5, 9, 15, 20, 25, 30.
Value 30 should be interpreted as the last in each month.

creditAmount.description: Total amount of the product including credit costs

perMonthAmount.description: Per month amount of the purchase including monthly fee

realYearlyInterest.description: Real yearly interest rate including credit cost

EcsterPaymentFrontendApiModel.description: API Model for performing escter price calculation

cutOffDate.description: Date and time for this lead times cut off

deliveryDate.description: Delivery date for this lead time

freightId.description: Freight id for the fastest delivery

universeBackgroundImageId.description: Media id for campaign universe ribbon background.

universeBackgroundImageUrl.description: Image URL for campaign universe ribbon background.

universeForegroundImageId.description: Media id for campaign universe ribbon foreground image (logo).

universeForegroundImageUrl.description: Image URL for campaign universe ribbon foreground image (logo).

urlType.description: Helper used to determine where the campaign image should be fetched from.

externalUrl.description: User given url for the campaign image.

buttonUrlType.description:
Which url should be displayed in frontend
Expected values: "external", "friendly", ""

title.description:
Title of the list. Customer is able to name it if enum type for this list is favorite.
Buy again and Back in stock list names are static

products.description: Contains list of products which are added to this list

email.description: Email CustomerStockNotification will be sent to

priority.description: Priority of Customer's favorite store. Used for sorting

priority.description: Priority of Customer's favorite store. Used for sorting

FavoriteStoreInputApiModel.description: Input model for customer's favorite storesw

cheapestDelivery.description: Cheapest delivery price. Null if no deliveries are available.

basket.description: If basket was updated then this is returned, otherwise it's null.

isCollectionFromStoreAvailable.description: Collection from store is always available if the price is 0. Returns null when there are no products in basket

isDeliveryAvailable.description: Delivery is available if DeliveryFromPrice isn't null. Returns null when there are no products in basket

startURL.description: (string, 1): URL used to activate chosen eid client on consumers computer or mobile device. Only relevant when application and eid client reside on same device.

pollTime.description: (int, 1): time to wait until next poll, in milliseconds

lastName.description: Family/Last name of the authenticated person

firstName.description: Given/First name of the authenticated person

emailVerified.description: Boolean to indicate if email was successfully verified.

smsVerified.description: Boolean to indicate if phone was successfully verified.

activeRequestDate.description: Date set if there is already active GDPR request found after verifying phone and email.

cookiesEnabled.description: False if setting a cookie will be ignored and true otherwise.

localStorageEnabled.description: False if localstorage is not available and true otherwise.

deviceMemory.description:
Approximate amount of device memory in gigabytes.
There is upper and lower value bounds to protect users privacy, so this isnt completely accurate.

city.description: City name. Null if the request zipcode doesn't match to a city.

loginInput.description: Input for the login, phone or email.

customer can upgrade phone
